1 February 2024 – 14 February 2024 – The Falklands Islands - To meet the Falkland Islands Government and Legislative Assembly and to learn about the challenges and future of the islands. To promote the links between Wales and the Falkland Islands and to learn more about Wales's contribution to the history and culture of the islands. All costs covered by the Falkland Islands Government.
